title: Day 706
content:
# Day 706

Today, I found myself entangled in the usual web of life's anxieties, but my daughter's sheer joy cut through that haze like sunlight through clouds. I decided to let go of my mounting to-do list and simply bask in her presence. Together, we danced, laughed, and played, immersing ourselves in pure, unadulterated happiness.

Children possess a remarkable ability to live in the moment, unburdened by the complexities that occupy adult minds. They remain indifferent to the fluctuations of Bitcoin or the pressures of work. They're oblivious to the latest updates in technology, like the next.js framework I'm trying to build with that is pissing me off LOL. All children seek is our time and undivided attention.

I am profoundly grateful for my daughter's intelligence, kindness, and ceaseless happiness. She serves as a vivid reminder of what truly matters. Next time life's stressors begin to weigh on me, I'll recall this day and the simple yet profound joy of her company.

Thank you Sloan. Daddy loves you!

I also enjoyed watching BTC rip today, but not as much as I enjoy spending time with my kid!

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*Un0Xt3ayS-yq4QKAff5AgQ.png)

2/26/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
